meanings.definition: The arrangement of flowers on a plant.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful inflorescences.
meanings.sent2: The inflorescences on the rose bush were vibrant and colorful.
meanings.sent3: The inflorescences seemed to be having a party, all standing in a row.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was adorned with inflorescences, making her look like a blooming garden.
meanings.sent5: The inflorescences swayed gently in the breeze, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.sent1: Spring brings the joyous time of inflorescences to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The inflorescences of the cherry tree signaled the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent3: The inflorescences decided to throw a surprise party for the bees.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like the inflorescences in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The inflorescences of the daisies opened up to greet the morning sun.

meanings.definition: A cluster of flowers on a plant.
meanings.sent1: The florist arranged a beautiful bouquet of inflorescences.
meanings.sent2: The inflorescences on the cactus were small but striking.
meanings.sent3: The inflorescences huddled together, whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was adorned with delicate inflorescences, adding a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The inflorescences in the garden created a colorful patchwork of blooms.
